atk-s0401a3:1_0: 21-22. Tatiyassa paṭhame abhāvitanti avaḍḍhitaṁ bhāvanāvasena appavattitaṁ. Akammaniyaṁ
atk-s0401a3:1_1: hotīti kammakkhamaṁ kammayoggaṁ na hoti. Dutiye vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0401a3:1_2: Ettha ca paṭhame cittanti vaṭṭavasena uppannacittaṁ, dutiye vivaṭṭavasena uppannacittaṁ.
atk-s0401a3:1_3: Tattha ca vaṭṭaṁ vaṭṭapādaṁ, vivaṭṭaṁ vivaṭṭapādanti ayaṁ pabhedo veditabbo. Vaṭṭaṁ
atk-s0401a3:1_4: nāma tebhūmakavaṭṭaṁ, vaṭṭapādaṁ nāma vaṭṭapaṭilābhāya kammaṁ, vivaṭṭaṁ nāma nava
atk-s0401a3:1_5: lokuttaradhammā, vivaṭṭapādaṁ nāma vivaṭṭapaṭilābhāya kammaṁ. Iti imesu suttesu vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitanti.
atk-s0401a3:2_0: 23-24. Tatiye vaṭṭavaseneva uppannacittaṁ veditabbaṁ. Mahato anatthāya saṁvattatīti
atk-s0401a3:2_3: detīti mahato anatthāya saṁvattati nāmāti. Catutthe cittanti vivaṭṭavaseneva uppannacittaṁ.
atk-s0401a3:3_0: 25-26. Pañcamachaṭṭhesu abhāvitaṁ apātubhūtanti ayaṁ viseso. Tatrāmayadhippāyo –
atk-s0401a3:3_1: vaṭṭavasena uppannacittaṁ nāma uppannampi abhāvitaṁ apātubhūtameva hoti. Kasmā ?
atk-s0401a3:3_3: uppannaṁ pana bhāvitaṁ pātubhūtaṁ nāma hoti. Kasmā? Tesu dhammesu pakkhandituṁ samatthattā.
atk-s0401a3:3_4: Kurundakavāsī phussamittatthero panāha – “maggacittameva, āvuso, bhāvitaṁ pātubhūtaṁ nāma hotī”ti.
atk-s0401a3:4: 27-28. Sattamaṭṭhamesu abahulīkatanti punappunaṁ akataṁ. Imānipi dve vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena uppannacittāneva veditabbānīti.
atk-s0401a3:5_0: 29. Navame “jātipi dukkhā”tiādinā nayena vuttaṁ dukkhaṁ adhivahati āharatīti dukkhādhivahaṁ.
atk-s0401a3:5_2: dukkhena adhivāhīyati pesīyatīti dukkhādhivāhaṁ. Idampi vaṭṭavasena uppannacittameva.
atk-s0401a3:5_3: Tañhi vuttappakārā devamanussādisampattiyo dadamānampi jātiādīnaṁ adhivahanato dukkhādhivahaṁ,
atk-s0401a3:6_0: 30. Dasame vivaṭṭavasena uppannacittameva cittaṁ. Tañhi mānusakasukhato dibbasukhaṁ,
atk-s0401a3:6_1: dibbasukhato jhānasukhaṁ, jhānasukhato vipassanāsukhaṁ, vipassanāsukhato maggasukhaṁ,
atk-s0401a3:6_2: maggasukhato phalasukhaṁ, phalasukhato nibbānasukhaṁ adhivahati āharatīti sukhādhivahaṁ
atk-s0401a3:6_3: nāma hoti, sukhādhivāhaṁ vā. Tañhi lokuttarapādakajjhānādiariyadhammābhimukhaṁ supesayaṁ
atk-s0401a3:6_4: vissaṭṭhaindavajirasadisaṁ hotīti sukhādhivāhantipi vuccati. Imasmimpi vagge vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitanti.
